Title: I'm Gonna Git You Sucka
Actors: Keenen Ivory Wayans, Bernie Casey, Antonio Fargas, Steve James
Plot: Jack Spade returns home from the army in his old ghetto neighborhood when his brother, Junebug dies from O.G. - over gold. Jack declares war on Mr. Big, powerful local crime lord. His army is led by John Slade, his childhood idol who used to fight bad guys in the '70s.
Production: Metro Goldwyn Mayer, Ivory Way Productions
